item.title: Admin,owner- mod in 508?
item.dc:creator: @laka laka
item.description:
@laka wrote:

nardoscape:

go to your characters file and then search for your ingame name and open with wordpad and change your rights from 0 to 2 (which is admin) there is no owner in 508’s so if you want to be to owner youd have to add another rights for 3 or 4.

how do i add?

Read full topic
